title: Just Do It!!
text:
Hello
Welcome to the landing page for hte ‘JDI’ club. We are an oganization charged with ensuring our members live their life to their maximum capabilities.


Commands
Below are the commands to create this quarto website using the terminal.
quarto create --help
quarto create project
> select website
> enter title
> enter directory(current .)

To preview the website  quarto preview
Build up of the preview: the preview might not pick up changes to non-website related fiels so use render. This shuts down everything and starts it back up again ensuring the site is built up from scratch, everything is picked up.  quarto render



Notes
How does quarto know I am in a quarto project The yml(yet another markdown language) file acts as a config with the instructions to let quarto know that the folder is a project.
What is localhost Simple version - I am running stuff on my machine.
Note Quarto is nice it provides terminal prompts to guide in creating whatever.
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.
